attributes.action: Cease all UK aid to Sudan in responce to the imprisonment of Gillian Gibbons, and continuing human rights abuses in Darfur.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The action taken in Sudan resulting in the  sentence being passed on Gillian Gibbons is unacceptable. A political move by the Sudanese authorities should be met with a political response by the UK Government.

Sudan continues to abuse human rights and shows total contempt for the lives of those living in Darfur. The UK Government has to respond to this using the only tool at its disposal - Sanctions and the withdrawal of UK aid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
